meanings.definition: A type of salmon found in the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent1: The sockeye swam gracefully upstream to spawn.
meanings.sent2: I love to eat grilled sockeye salmon with lemon.
meanings.sent3: The sockeye salmon told a fishy joke at the underwater party.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant sockeye salmon stood out among the other fish in the river.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the sockeye salmon caught the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: Her cheeks turned a bright sockeye hue when she blushed.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed red and orange to create a beautiful sockeye shade.
meanings.sent3: The sunset painted the sky in a stunning sockeye glow.
meanings.sent4: The autumn leaves transformed into a rich sockeye color.
meanings.sent5: The ripe strawberries had a deep sockeye redness.
